import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Editor } from "react-draft-wysiwyg"; import { EditorState } from "draft-js"; import "react-draft-wysiwyg/dist/react-draft-wysiwyg.css"; const Form = () => { const [editorState, setEditorState] = useState(() => EditorState.createEmpty() ); useEffect(() => { console.log(editorState); }, [editorState]); return (
); return (
) } export default Form
